thread.title: Reid Harlocker
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by Reid Harlocker

author: Reid Harlocker
title: Reid Harlocker
text: I've been ordering from OOL for sometime now. The service and selection are exceptional, and the products excellent. OOL helpfully labels product with the harvest date which is almost always missing from store bought product in the US. The website provides excellent and accurate product information and the variety is good. Recently I gave the Olio Quattrociocchi Truffle Aroma a try with outstanding results. The flavor is superb. About the only negative is that they do not offer any Croatian oil, a personal favorite!
